member.name: M:MvcContrib.TestHelper.ActionResultHelper.WithViewData``1(System.Web.Mvc.PartialViewResult)
member.summary: Asserts that a RenderViewResult's value has been set using a strongly typed value, returning that value if successful. If the type is a reference type, a view data set to null will be returned as null. If the type is a value type, a view data set to null will throw an exception.
member.typeparam: The custom type for the view data.
member.returns: The ViewData in it's strongly-typed form.

member.typeparam: The custom type for the view data.
member.returns: The ViewData in it's strongly-typed form.

member.name: T:MvcContrib.TestHelper.TestControllerBuilder
member.summary: This is primary class used to create controllers. After initializing, call InitializeController to create a controller with proper environment elements. Exposed properties such as Form, QueryString, and HttpContext allow access to text environment. RenderViewData and RedirectToActionData record those methods
